main.name: Andrea Thomas
main.description: I'm a student pursuing full-stack web development through the University of Washington
main.bio: After graduating with a Psychology degree from West Chester University of Pennsylvania, I returned to Seattle and signed on with a high-tech family of five. I'm on track to graduate from a coding bootcamp with an emphasis on JavaScript and React app development.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience in customer service, childcare, and junior web development

education.description: The coding bootcamp exposed me to over 80 technologies, which prepared me to seeking full-stack development
Pursuing a degree in Psychology helped me gain invaluable human behavior knowledge and secure jobs in counseling and childcare.

work.title: Residence Manager
work.description: Supervise daily internal and external functions. Health and safety management. Project coordination with contractors. Inventory, transportation, scheduling, and purchasing

work.title: Tobacco Cessation Counselor
work.description: Phone-based counselor for patients seeking tobacco cessation help. Operated inbound and outbound calls, while documenting patient info into company database for other coaches. Evaluated patient benefits via client contracts. Maintained call length as outlined by supervisors. HIPAA compliant.

projects.title: ComiCall
projects.category: Group-based app with Google Map for comic search

projects.title: SushiMe
projects.category: Group-produced flashcard app for learning sushi terms in Japanese
